```{r, include=FALSE}
#--------------- Archivos de datos ----------------
distritos <- st_read('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pf0953-programaciongeoespacialr-2020/datos/master/delimitacion-territorial-administrativa/cr/ign/cr_limite_distrital_ign_wgs84.geojson')

capa <- st_read("C:\\Users\\Kevin\\Documents\\R\\Primer-conteo-de-primates\\SHP\\intersect.shp")

datos <- read.csv("~/R/Primer-conteo-de-primates/files/datos.csv")

sf_datos <- left_join(distritos, datos, by= c("provincia", "canton", "distrito")) %>%
  drop_na()


cara_blanca <- datos %>%
  filter(Especie == "Cebus  imitator")

araña <- datos %>%
  filter(Especie == "Ateles geoffroyi")

titi <- datos %>%
  filter(Especie == "Saimiri oerstedii")

congo <- datos %>%
  filter(Especie == "Alouatta palliata")

asp <- sf::st_read("C:\\Users\\Kevin\\Documents\\R\\Primer-conteo-de-primates\\SHP\\ASP.shp")

asp_wgs84 <- asp %>%
  st_transform(4326)


#--------------- Otros parámetros -----------------

ucr <- "https://github.com/Kevinchaes/Primer-conteo-de-primates/blob/master/files/UCR.PNG"
acoprico <- "https://github.com/Kevinchaes/Primer-conteo-de-primates/blob/master/files/ACOPRICO.jpeg"
madeso <- "https://github.com/Kevinchaes/Primer-conteo-de-primates/blob/master/files/firma%20madeso.PNG"



# area de conservacion
cr_ac <-
  st_read("C:\\Users\\Kevin\\Documents\\R\\Primer-conteo-de-primates\\SHP\\AConsevacionSINAC2014.shp")

# Red vial de Costa Rica
cr_redvial <- st_read("C:\\Users\\Kevin\\Documents\\R\\Primer-conteo-de-primates\\SHP\\vias 1200mil.shp")


ac_wgs84 <- cr_ac %>%
  st_transform(4326)

redvial_wgs84 <- cr_redvial %>%
  st_transform(4326)

```

### Distribución espacial de registros
```{r}

leaflet(datos) %>%
  fitBounds(lng1 = -86, lng2 = -82, lat1 = 8, lat2 = 11) %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$OpenStreetMap.Mapnik, group = "Open StreeT Map") %>%
  addTiles(urlTemplate ="https://mts1.google.com/vt/lyrs=s&hl=en&src=app&x={x}&y={y}&z={z}&s=G", attribution = 'Google', group = "Google Maps") %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.DarkMatter, group = "CartoDB DarkMatter") %>%
  addMarkers(clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions(),
             group = "Registros",
             popup = paste(
               "Especie: ", datos$Especie, "<br>",
               "Nombre común: ", datos$Nombre_com, "<br>",
               "Registros: ", datos$Total, "<br>",
               "Provincia: ", datos$provincia, "<br>",
               "Cantón: ", datos$canton, "<br>",
               "Distrito: ", datos$distrito, "<br>")) %>%
  addMarkers(data= titi, group = "Registros titi",
              popup = paste(
                "Especie: ", titi$Especie, "<br>",
                "Nombre común: ", titi$Nombre_com, "<br>",
                "Registros: ", titi$Total, "<br>",
                "Provincia: ", titi$provincia, "<br>",
                "Cantón: ", titi$canton, "<br>",
                "Distrito: ", titi$distrito, "<br>")) %>%
  addMarkers(data= congo, group = "Registros congo",
              popup = paste(
                "Especie: ", congo$Especie, "<br>",
                "Nombre común: ", congo$Nombre_com, "<br>",
                "Registros: ", congo$Total, "<br>",
                "Provincia: ", congo$provincia, "<br>",
                "Cantón: ", congo$canton, "<br>",
                "Distrito: ", congo$distrito, "<br>")) %>%
  addMarkers(data= araña, group = "Registros araña",
              popup = paste(
                "Especie: ", araña$Especie, "<br>",
                "Nombre común: ", araña$Nombre_com, "<br>",
                "Registros: ", araña$Total, "<br>",
                "Provincia: ", araña$provincia, "<br>",
                "Cantón: ", araña$canton, "<br>",
                "Distrito: ", araña$distrito, "<br>")) %>%
  addMarkers(data= cara_blanca, group = "Registros cara blanca",
              popup = paste(
                "Especie: ", cara_blanca$Especie, "<br>",
                "Nombre común: ", cara_blanca$Nombre_com, "<br>",
                "Registros: ", cara_blanca$Total, "<br>",
                "Provincia: ", cara_blanca$provincia, "<br>",
                "Cantón: ", cara_blanca$canton, "<br>",
                "Distrito: ", cara_blanca$distrito, "<br>")) %>%
  addPolygons(
    data = sf_datos,
    stroke=T, fillOpacity = 0,
    color="red", weight=0.3, opacity= 2.0,
    group = "Distritos con registros",
    popup = paste(
      "Provincia: ", sf_datos$provincia, "<br>",
      "Cantón: ", sf_datos$canton, "<br>",
      "Distrito: ", sf_datos$distrito, "<br>",
      "Especie: ", sf_datos$Especie, "<br>",
      "Nombre común: ", sf_datos$Nombre_com, "<br>",
      "Registros: ", sf_datos$Total, "<br>")) %>%
  addHeatmap(data = datos,
             lng = ~longitude, lat = ~latitude, intensity = ~pal(Total),
             blur = 10, max = max(datos$Total), radius = 15,
             group = "Densidad") %>%
  addPolygons(data= asp_wgs84, color = "#35b541", fill = TRUE, fillColor = "#35b541", stroke = T, weight = 3, opacity = 0.5,
              group = "ASP",
              popup = paste("Área Silvestre Protegida:", asp_wgs84$nombre_asp, "Área de conservación:", asp_wgs84$nombre_ac, sep = '<br/>')) %>%
  addPolygons(data = ac_wgs84, color = "#35b541", fill = TRUE, fillColor = "#35b541", stroke = T, weight = 3, opacity = 0.5,
              group = "Área de Conservación",
              popup = paste(
                "Área de conservación: ", ac_wgs84$AREA_CONSE, "<br>")) %>%
  addPolylines(data = redvial_wgs84, color = "#818c8c", fill = TRUE, fillColor = "#818c8c", stroke = T, weight = 3, opacity = 0.5,
               group = "Red Vial",
               smoothFactor = 10) %>%
  addLayersControl(baseGroups = c("OpenStreetMap", "Google Maps", "CartoDB DarkMatter"),
                   overlayGroups = c("Registros", "Registros titi", "Registros congo", "Registros araña", "Registros cara blanca", "Distritos con registros", "Densidad", "ASP", "Área de Conservación", "Red Vial"),
                   options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = TRUE))  %>%
  addScaleBar()  %>%
  hideGroup(c("Distritos con registros", "Registros titi", "Registros congo", "Registros araña", "Registros cara blanca", "Densidad", "ASP", "Área de Conservación", "Red Vial")) %>%
  addMiniMap(
    toggleDisplay = TRUE,
    position = "bottomleft",
    tiles = providers$OpenStreetMap.Mapnik)

```
